response_parsed.title: Testing Strategies for Code with pytest (Python 3.12+)
response_parsed.summary: This document provides an overview of testing strategies using pytest, a popular and powerful testing framework for Python 3.12+ applications.
key_points: pytest supports both unit and integration tests
It offers flexible fixtures to manage test setup and teardown
The framework can be easily integrated with other tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, and Selenium for continuous testing
Markers are used to categorize or filter tests based on their purpose or requirements
pytest-cov plugin helps to generate code coverage reports
Test fixtures can be parametrized for performing repetitive tests with different input data
version_notes: Support for newer Python versions like 3.10 and 3.11 is also available with backward compatibility for older versions
caveats: pytest-xdist plugin is required for parallel testing
When using pytest alongside other testing frameworks, be aware of potential conflicts and setup configurations accordingly
